data.title: New BCG/MIT Study: 76% of Leaders Call Agentic AI Colleagues, Not Tools
data.description: Agentic AI is rapidly shifting from software to “coworker,” with 76% of leaders already treating AI agents as teammates—reshaping workflows, skills, governance, and the future of work.
data.keywords: agentic ai adoption, ai agents in the workplace, future of work ai, ai governance, autonomous ai systems
